author: coindesk.com
title: Bitcoin Cash Jumps to $480 as 24-Hour Trading Volume Spikes 22% Above Average
description:
BCH rose 3.15% in the past 24 hours to $480.10, climbing sharply from a session low near $454 after buyers stepped in to reverse early weakness, according to CoinDesk Research's technical analysis model. 
While much of the crypto market struggled under pressu…
